text.emotional: I’ll have to keep an eye on that fool so he doesn’t overfeed. Ruminal acidosis is no fun if they eat too much fermentable, carbohydrate-rich feeds.
text.silence: {.} i'll have to keep an eye on that fool so he doesn't overfeed {....} ruminal acidosis is no fun {...} if they eat too much fermentable carbohydrate rich feeds {...}
